mainText:
Welcome to Bank of Entitlement, where you deserve everything you desire just for being you! Get exclusive access to unlimited credit with no consequences today.

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So there I was, strutting into a fancy restaurant with my entourage, ready to flaunt my riches and bask in the envy of onlookers. As we sat down at a prime table, I casually asked the waiter to bring me a glass of water with two fresh slices of organic lemon. But to my absolute horror, he had the audacity to bring me just one measly lemon slice!In a fit of entitlement-fueled rage, I stood up, knocking over my chair, and declared in a booming voice that I would not stand for such disrespect. I demanded to see the manager immediately. When the trembling manager finally arrived, I unleashed a tirade of entitlement, insisting that my entire meal should be comped as compensation for the egregious lemon discrepancy.After causing a scene that would make even the most seasoned diva proud, the manager caved and not only comped my meal but also threw in a bottle of champagne on the house. As I sipped on my bubbly, I couldn't help but smirk, knowing that my entitlement had once again proven victorious. Ah, the sweet taste of getting what I want-I truly am the master of my own destiny.
